OOC: Mach 1 is the top air speed, so you should consider reducing his 
speed a bit. Also, Only Vlad is on the same continent for now.

BIC:

Tyrael leaves CR chamber soon after Spike went out. He noted the 
indications on the holographic representation of the continent. The 
alien lifeform was running fast for seemingly no reason. Spike was 
rolling to meet him.

Tyrael: Computer, show actual state of the defense grid.

The holographic representation switched to that of the base.

Computer: Actual state of defense grid: 6 half-mobile autoguns 
operational, shield generator at 100%, shields at 100%.

The rest of the group had done a good work. He would have to commend 
them for their value despite just coming out of a tactical defeat.

Tyrael: All right, Tripredacus. Everyone on the base report back. 
Defenses are good for now.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...> wrote:
> Spike now fully repaired started to check the scanners for those 2 
> lifeforms they picked up before after a bit of seaching he picked up 
> them up and without thinking transformer and starts to roll along 
the 
> ground at M 2 heading for the 2 mechs
